itemDescription: Crop rotation is the practice of growing different types of crops in the same area in sequential seasons. It helps improve soil health, reduce pests and diseases, and increase crop yield.

2. Buchu


Known for its aromatic leaves, buchu is hailed for its anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties, making it a valuable herb for various medicinal purposes. famous healthy food


Buchu tea is derived from the leaves of the Agathosma betulina plant, which is native to South Africa, not South America. The plant is known for its aromatic leaves and has been traditionally used for its potential health benefits. If you are looking for a South American herbal tea, you might want to explore options like yerba mate or other local herbal infusions. famous healthy food
